refnamediv.refpurpose: Execute custom request like any other eio_* call.

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
resourceeio_custom mixedexecute intpri mixedcallback mixeddataNULL
eio_custom executes custom function specified by execute processing it just like any other eio_* call.
May crash with xdebug extension. See issue http://bugs.xdebug.org/view.php?id=725

&reftitle.returnvalues;
eio_custom returns request resource on success or &false; on error.
